titles.title: You are the source of life,

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
You are the source of life,
I can't be left behind.
No one else will do,
I will take hold of You.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
I need You, Jesus, to come to my rescue,
Where else can I go?
There's no other name by which I am saved,
Capture me with grace,
I will follow You.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
This world has nothing for me,
I will follow You.
This world has nothing for me,
I will follow You.
